name: Zenurik Sumdali
description: Adorn your Landing Craft with the Zenurik crystal.

languages.description: Schmücke dein Landungsschiff mit dem Zenurik-Kristall.
languages.name: Sumdali: Zenurik

languages.description: Décorez votre Vaisseau de Débarquement avec le cristal Zenurik.
languages.name: Sumdali Zenurik

languages.description: Decora la tua Navicella con il cristallo Zanurik.
languages.name: Sumdali Zenurik

languages.description: Decora tu nave de desembarco con el cristal Zenurik.
languages.name: Sumdali Zenurik

languages.description: 通过 Zenurik 之晶装饰你的登陆艇。
languages.name: Zenurik 船徽

languages.description: ランディングクラフトにZenurik結晶を飾ろう。
languages.name: Zenurik サムダリー

languages.description: Ozdób swój Statek desantowy kryształem Zenurik.
languages.name: Sumdali Zenurik

languages.description: Enfeite sua Nave de Pouso com o cristal da Escola Zenurik.
languages.name: Sumdali da Zenurik

languages.description: 透過 Zenurik 水晶來點綴你的登陸艇。
languages.name: Zenurik 船標

languages.description: ตกแต่งยานลงจอดของคุณด้วยกลุ่มหมอก Zenurik
languages.name: Zenurik Sumdali

languages.description: Çıkarma Gemini Zenurik kristali ile süsle.
languages.name: Zenurik Sumdali
